languages.text: "Вам виднее, Ваша Светлость. Я женщина простая, живу просто, думаю просто, а если заверну что-то такое — так это от неумности", {n}— Рета пожимает плечами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вам виднее, ваше благородие. Я женщина простая, живу просто, думаю просто, а если заверну что-то такое — так это от неумности", {n}— Рета пожимает плечами.{/n}
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "If you say so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'm a simple woman, living a simple life, having simple thoughts, and if I happen to blurt out some bunkum — that's just because I'm not that bright." {n}Reta shrugs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вам виднее, Ваша Светлость. Я женщина простая, живу просто, думаю просто, а если заверну что-то такое — так это от неумности", {n}— Рета пожимает плечами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "If you say so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'm a simple woman, living a simple life, having simple thoughts, and if I happen to blurt out some bunkum — that's just because I'm not that bright." {n}Reta shrugs.{/n}
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: "If you say so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'm a simple woman, living a simple life, having simple thoughts, and if I happen to blurt out some bunkum — that's just because I'm not that bright." {n}Reta shrugs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "If you say so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'm a simple woman, living a simple life, having simple thoughts, and if I happen to blurt out some bunkum — that's just because I'm not that bright." {n}Reta shrugs.{/n}
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: "If you say so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'm a simple woman, living a simple life, having simple thoughts, and if I happen to blurt out some bunkum — that's just because I'm not that bright." {n}Reta shrugs.{/n}
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: “既然您这么说，那就是了，大人。我只是个简单的女人，过着简单的生活，脑子里装的也都是简单的想法。如果我不小心胡说八道，那只是因为我没那么聪明。”{n}蕾塔耸了耸肩。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you say so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'm a simple woman, living a simple life, having simple thoughts, and if I happen to blurt out some bunkum — that's just because I'm not that bright." {n}Reta shrugs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “既然您这么说，那就是了，大人。我只是个简单的女人，过着简单的生活，脑子里装的也都是简单的想法。如果我不小心胡说八道，那只是因为我没那么聪明。”{n}蕾塔耸了耸肩。{/n}
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: «Si usted lo dice, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Soy una mujer sencilla con una vida sencilla e ideas sencillas, de modo que, si digo alguna bobada, es porque no soy muy inteligente». {n}Reta se encoge de hombros.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you say so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'm a simple woman, living a simple life, having simple thoughts, and if I happen to blurt out some bunkum — that's just because I'm not that bright." {n}Reta shrugs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Si usted lo dice, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Soy una mujer sencilla con una vida sencilla e ideas sencillas, de modo que, si digo alguna bobada, es porque no soy muy inteligente». {n}Reta se encoge de hombros.{/n}
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: 「そうおっしゃるのでしたら、陛下。私は単純なことを考えて、単純な生活を送っている、単純な女です。ですから、たまたま私がちょっとした失言を口走ってしまったとしても、それは単に私がそれほど聡明ではないからです」{n}レタは肩をすくめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you say so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'm a simple woman, living a simple life, having simple thoughts, and if I happen to blurt out some bunkum — that's just because I'm not that bright." {n}Reta shrugs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そうおっしゃるのでしたら、陛下。私は単純なことを考えて、単純な生活を送っている、単純な女です。ですから、たまたま私がちょっとした失言を口走ってしまったとしても、それは単に私がそれほど聡明ではないからです」{n}レタは肩をすくめる。{/n}
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr das sagt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich bin eine einfache Frau, führe ein einfaches Leben, habe einfache Gedanken und rede gerne mal Unsinn – einfach, weil ich nicht besonders klug bin." {n}Reta zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you say so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'm a simple woman, living a simple life, having simple thoughts, and if I happen to blurt out some bunkum — that's just because I'm not that bright." {n}Reta shrugs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr das sagt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich bin eine einfache Frau, führe ein einfaches Leben, habe einfache Gedanken und rede gerne mal Unsinn – einfach, weil ich nicht besonders klug bin." {n}Reta zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n}
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: « Si vous le dites, Votre Seigneurie. Je suis une femme simple, qui mène une vie simple et qui a des pensées simples. S'il m'arrive de dire des bêtises, c'est juste parce que je ne suis pas très intelligente. » {n}Réta hausse les épaules.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you say so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'm a simple woman, living a simple life, having simple thoughts, and if I happen to blurt out some bunkum — that's just because I'm not that bright." {n}Reta shrugs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Si vous le dites, Votre Seigneurie. Je suis une femme simple, qui mène une vie simple et qui a des pensées simples. S'il m'arrive de dire des bêtises, c'est juste parce que je ne suis pas très intelligente. » {n}Réta hausse les épaules.{/n}
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Öyle diyorsanız öyledir {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ben basit bir kadınım: Basit bir hayat yaşayıp basit şeyler düşünürüm. Ağzımdan boş laf kaçırdıysam affola... Aptallığıma yorun." {n}Reta omuz silkiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If you say so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I'm a simple woman, living a simple life, having simple thoughts, and if I happen to blurt out some bunkum — that's just because I'm not that bright." {n}Reta shrugs.{/n}
